name: Fractured Memories
description:
In 4056 AC. The outpost base Third Haven in the Andromeda Galaxy receives a signal for help from a planet located in the star cluster, Vivar. Alex, our protagonist, takes the mission to explore the planet Steron where the signal comes, and rescue the lost space travelers.

At the arrival to Steron, something destroys the Alex's spaceship.
Collect the Memories left behind by the lost space travelers to gain knowledge about what happened in Steron at their arrival.

Now he is alone, and the only way to escape is finding who send the message to have a chance to back home.
